name: Matrice Penalty Shootout
description:
*(Designed & tested on PC - may behave differently on tablets)* 

In order to underatnd the Matrice you first need to master Mathematics. Practise all of your Times Tables to improve your rapid recall.   After each game you will get feedback about the Times Tables you missed.  The list will let you know which Times Tables you find tricky & need to practise more. Best of luck :) 

If you need proof this Soccer Keeper has the secret knowledge of the Matrice vs him with Zero Times Tables - his reflexes are beyond our understanding of reality (literally). 

{It took lots of trial and error, and bug finding to make sure it wouldn't freeze - no matter how fast you answer, enjoy}.
